channel.title: IATI v2.02 example file
channel.description:
Hi all,
I couldn't find an example file containing all v2.02 fields yet (only v2.01, see here: http://iatistandard.org/202/activity-standard/example-xml/). Maybe it's located somewhere else, but it was easy to add all v2.02 fields based on the documentation of the elements, so I've updated the v2.01 example file with the new fields.
If anyone's interested, it's located here: http://kasperbrandt.nl/iati/activity-standard-example-annotated-v202.xml
Regards, Kasper

item.title: IATI v2.02 example file
item.dc:creator: Kasper
item.description:
Ah, right… Hadn’t noticed the mention of v2.01 in the example file link. Thx @dalepotter.

Read full topic

item.title: IATI v2.02 example file
item.dc:creator: dalepotter
item.description:
HI @Kasper, thanks for posting re this. It seems that the link you mentioned contained valid version 2.02 example XML on the page, however the link to download the example usage XML did indeed refer to version 2.01. I’ve fixed this in the code, and this should be rolled out to the site before the end of the week.

In the meantime, I can confirm that the correct link to the example annotated XML should be: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/IATI/IATI-Extra-Documentation/version-2.02/en/activity-standard/activity-standard-example-annotated.xml

Read full topic

item.title: IATI v2.02 example file
item.dc:creator: Kasper
item.description:
Hi all,

I couldn’t find an example file containing all v2.02 fields yet (only v2.01, see here: http://iatistandard.org/202/activity-standard/example-xml/). Maybe it’s located somewhere else, but it was easy to add all v2.02 fields based on the documentation of the elements, so I’ve updated the v2.01 example file with the new fields.

If anyone’s interested, it’s located here: http://kasperbrandt.nl/iati/activity-standard-example-annotated-v202.xml

Regards,
Kasper
